key_risks: High exposure to commercial real estate (CRE) loans, which are vulnerable to sector downturns
Economic sensitivity, particularly in California, with risks from rising interest rates and inflation
Regulatory scrutiny, especially in anti-money laundering (AML) and fair lending compliance
Customer concentration in Korean-American and Asian-American communities, which could be impacted by economic hardships
Intense competition from larger banks, regional banks, and fintech companies
controversies: Potential regulatory enforcement actions due to AML and fair lending compliance issues
social_issues: Economic vulnerability of the Korean-American and Asian-American communities served by the bank
governance_issues: Ongoing regulatory scrutiny and potential compliance challenges
